price: ‘আল্লাহৰ শপত! নিশ্চয় আমি স্পষ্ট পথভ্ৰষ্টতাত আছিলোঁ,
arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: tal-lahi in kunnā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
